    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Illuminated Folio](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2179)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The pages of this part-spellbook, part-bestiary are illustrated with all manner of creatures, magical and mundane. The illustrations shift and move around the page when examined.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [spellshape](/Traits.aspx?ID=513))    **Effect** If your next action is to cast a [summon](/Traits.aspx?ID=520) spell prepared from this grimoire, you summon creatures from the illuminated folio rather than their usual source. These summoned creatures appear as living illustrations, granting them [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) to physical damage equal to half their level and weakness 5 to fire and to any ability with the water trait. They can also fold themselves up to pass through spaces only an inch or so wide as part of their movement.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
